--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Mitchell Timin <zenguyuno@y...> wrote:
> The NEAT Yahoo groups site now has the C code to play
> the 4 card concentration puzzle.  It's not much of a
> puzzle unless your IQ is about that of a frog, but its
> reasonably challenging for an ANN.  I hope one of our
> readers will use NEAT to make a player.
> 
> I think the code is easy to understand if you know C.
> I'm willing to help with more explanations if
> necessary.
> 
> 

Well I hope someone does try this out since it is a very
interesting experiment on memory.  Thanks for adding this code to the
group.  

ken
